00077 #define PEM_BUFSIZE     1024

00079 #define PEM_OBJ_UNDEF       0
00080 #define PEM_OBJ_X509        1
00081 #define PEM_OBJ_X509_REQ    2
00082 #define PEM_OBJ_CRL     3
00083 #define PEM_OBJ_SSL_SESSION 4
00084 #define PEM_OBJ_PRIV_KEY    10
00085 #define PEM_OBJ_PRIV_RSA    11
00086 #define PEM_OBJ_PRIV_DSA    12
00087 #define PEM_OBJ_PRIV_DH     13
00088 #define PEM_OBJ_PUB_RSA     14
00089 #define PEM_OBJ_PUB_DSA     15
00090 #define PEM_OBJ_PUB_DH      16
00091 #define PEM_OBJ_DHPARAMS    17
00092 #define PEM_OBJ_DSAPARAMS   18
00093 #define PEM_OBJ_PRIV_RSA_PUBLIC 19

00095 #define PEM_ERROR       30
00096 #define PEM_DEK_DES_CBC         40
00097 #define PEM_DEK_IDEA_CBC        45
00098 #define PEM_DEK_DES_EDE         50
00099 #define PEM_DEK_DES_ECB         60
00100 #define PEM_DEK_RSA             70
00101 #define PEM_DEK_RSA_MD2         80
00102 #define PEM_DEK_RSA_MD5         90

00104 #define PEM_MD_MD2      NID_md2
00105 #define PEM_MD_MD5      NID_md5
00106 #define PEM_MD_SHA      NID_sha
00107 #define PEM_MD_MD2_RSA      NID_md2WithRSAEncryption
00108 #define PEM_MD_MD5_RSA      NID_md5WithRSAEncryption
00109 #define PEM_MD_SHA_RSA      NID_sha1WithRSAEncryption

00111 #define PEM_STRING_X509_OLD "X509 CERTIFICATE"
00112 #define PEM_STRING_X509     "CERTIFICATE"
00113 #define PEM_STRING_X509_TRUSTED "TRUSTED CERTIFICATE"
00114 #define PEM_STRING_X509_REQ_OLD "NEW CERTIFICATE REQUEST"
00115 #define PEM_STRING_X509_REQ "CERTIFICATE REQUEST"
00116 #define PEM_STRING_X509_CRL "X509 CRL"
00117 #define PEM_STRING_EVP_PKEY "ANY PRIVATE KEY"
00118 #define PEM_STRING_PUBLIC   "PUBLIC KEY"
00119 #define PEM_STRING_RSA      "RSA PRIVATE KEY"
00120 #define PEM_STRING_RSA_PUBLIC   "RSA PUBLIC KEY"
00121 #define PEM_STRING_DSA      "DSA PRIVATE KEY"
00122 #define PEM_STRING_DSA_PUBLIC   "DSA PUBLIC KEY"
00123 #define PEM_STRING_PKCS7    "PKCS7"
00124 #define PEM_STRING_PKCS8    "ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY"
00125 #define PEM_STRING_PKCS8INF "PRIVATE KEY"
00126 #define PEM_STRING_DHPARAMS "DH PARAMETERS"
00127 #define PEM_STRING_SSL_SESSION  "SSL SESSION PARAMETERS"
00128 #define PEM_STRING_DSAPARAMS    "DSA PARAMETERS"

00130   /* Note that this structure is initialised by PEM_SealInit and cleaned up
00131      by PEM_SealFinal (at least for now) */
00132 typedef struct PEM_Encode_Seal_st
00133     {
00134     EVP_ENCODE_CTX encode;
00135     EVP_MD_CTX md;
00136     EVP_CIPHER_CTX cipher;
00137     } PEM_ENCODE_SEAL_CTX;
00138 
00139 /* enc_type is one off */
00140 #define PEM_TYPE_ENCRYPTED      10
00141 #define PEM_TYPE_MIC_ONLY       20
00142 #define PEM_TYPE_MIC_CLEAR      30
00143 #define PEM_TYPE_CLEAR      40
00144 
00145 typedef struct pem_recip_st
00146     {
00147     char *name;
00148     X509_NAME *dn;
00149 
00150     int cipher;
00151     int key_enc;
00152     /*  char iv[8]; unused and wrong size */
00153     } PEM_USER;
00154 
00155 typedef struct pem_ctx_st
00156     {
00157     int type;       /* what type of object */
00158 
00159     struct  {
00160         int version;    
00161         int mode;       
00162         } proc_type;
00163 
00164     char *domain;
00165 
00166     struct  {
00167         int cipher;
00168     /* unused, and wrong size
00169        unsigned char iv[8]; */
00170         } DEK_info;
00171         
00172     PEM_USER *originator;
00173 
00174     int num_recipient;
00175     PEM_USER **recipient;
00176 
00177 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_STACK
00178     STACK *x509_chain;  /* certificate chain */
00179 #else
00180     char *x509_chain;   /* certificate chain */
00181 #endif
00182     EVP_MD *md;     /* signature type */
00183 
00184     int md_enc;     /* is the md encrypted or not? */
00185     int md_len;     /* length of md_data */
00186     char *md_data;      /* message digest, could be pkey encrypted */
00187 
00188     EVP_CIPHER *dec;    /* date encryption cipher */
00189     int key_len;        /* key length */
00190     unsigned char *key; /* key */
00191     /* unused, and wrong size
00192        unsigned char iv[8]; */
00193 
00194     
00195     int  data_enc;      /* is the data encrypted */
00196     int data_len;
00197     unsigned char *data;
00198     } PEM_CTX;
00199 
00200 /* These macros make the PEM_read/PEM_write functions easier to maintain and
00201  * write. Now they are all implemented with either:
00202  * IMPLEMENT_PEM_rw(...) or IMPLEMENT_PEM_rw_cb(...)
00203  */
00204 
00205 #ifdef OPENSSL_NO_FP_API
00206 
00207 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_read_fp(name, type, str, asn1) /**/
00208 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_fp(name, type, str, asn1) /**/
00209 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_cb_fp(name, type, str, asn1) /**/
00210 
00211 #else
00212 
00213 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_read_fp(name, type, str, asn1) \
00214 type *PEM_read_##name(FILE *fp, type **x, pem_password_cb *cb, void *u)\
00215 { \
00216 return((type *)PEM_ASN1_read((char *(*)())d2i_##asn1, str,fp,(char **)x,\
00217     cb,u)); \
00218 } \
00219 
00220 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_fp(name, type, str, asn1) \
00221 int PEM_write_##name(FILE *fp, type *x) \
00222 { \
00223 return(PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_##asn1,str,fp, (char *)x, \
00224                              NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)); \
00225 } 
00226 
00227 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_cb_fp(name, type, str, asn1) \
00228 int PEM_write_##name(FILE *fp, type *x, const EVP_CIPHER *enc, \
00229          unsigned char *kstr, int klen, pem_password_cb *cb, \
00230           void *u) \
00231     { \
00232     return(PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_##asn1,str,fp, \
00233         (char *)x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u)); \
00234     }
00235 
00236 #endif
00237 
00238 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_read_bio(name, type, str, asn1) \
00239 type *PEM_read_bio_##name(BIO *bp, type **x, pem_password_cb *cb, void *u)\
00240 { \
00241 return((type *)PEM_ASN1_read_bio((char *(*)())d2i_##asn1, str,bp,\
00242                             (char **)x,cb,u)); \
00243 }
00244 
00245 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_bio(name, type, str, asn1) \
00246 int PEM_write_bio_##name(BIO *bp, type *x) \
00247 { \
00248 return(PEM_ASN1_write_bio((int (*)())i2d_##asn1,str,bp, (char *)x, \
00249                              NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)); \
00250 }
00251 
00252 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_cb_bio(name, type, str, asn1) \
00253 int PEM_write_bio_##name(BIO *bp, type *x, const EVP_CIPHER *enc, \
00254          unsigned char *kstr, int klen, pem_password_cb *cb, void *u) \
00255     { \
00256     return(PEM_ASN1_write_bio((int (*)())i2d_##asn1,str,bp, \
00257         (char *)x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u)); \
00258     }
00259 
00260 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write(name, type, str, asn1) \
00261     IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_bio(name, type, str, asn1) \
00262     IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_fp(name, type, str, asn1) 
00263 
00264 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_cb(name, type, str, asn1) \
00265     IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_cb_bio(name, type, str, asn1) \
00266     IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_cb_fp(name, type, str, asn1) 
00267 
00268 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_read(name, type, str, asn1) \
00269     IMPLEMENT_PEM_read_bio(name, type, str, asn1) \
00270     IMPLEMENT_PEM_read_fp(name, type, str, asn1) 
00271 
00272 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_rw(name, type, str, asn1) \
00273     IMPLEMENT_PEM_read(name, type, str, asn1) \
00274     IMPLEMENT_PEM_write(name, type, str, asn1)
00275 
00276 #define IMPLEMENT_PEM_rw_cb(name, type, str, asn1) \
00277     IMPLEMENT_PEM_read(name, type, str, asn1) \
00278     IMPLEMENT_PEM_write_cb(name, type, str, asn1)
00279

00286 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_cb_fp(name, type) /**/
00287 
00288 #else
00289 
00290 #define DECLARE_PEM_read_fp(name, type) \
00291     type *PEM_read_##name(FILE *fp, type **x, pem_password_cb *cb, void *u);
00292 
00293 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_fp(name, type) \
00294     int PEM_write_##name(FILE *fp, type *x);
00295 
00296 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_cb_fp(name, type) \
00297     int PEM_write_##name(FILE *fp, type *x, const EVP_CIPHER *enc, \
00298          unsigned char *kstr, int klen, pem_password_cb *cb, void *u);
00299 
00300 #endif
00301 
00302 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_BIO
00303 #define DECLARE_PEM_read_bio(name, type) \
00304     type *PEM_read_bio_##name(BIO *bp, type **x, pem_password_cb *cb, void *u);
00305 
00306 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_bio(name, type) \
00307     int PEM_write_bio_##name(BIO *bp, type *x);
00308 
00309 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_cb_bio(name, type) \
00310     int PEM_write_bio_##name(BIO *bp, type *x, const EVP_CIPHER *enc, \
00311          unsigned char *kstr, int klen, pem_password_cb *cb, void *u);
00312 
00313 #else
00314 
00315 #define DECLARE_PEM_read_bio(name, type) /**/
00316 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_bio(name, type) /**/
00317 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_cb_bio(name, type) /**/
00318 
00319 #endif
00320 
00321 #define DECLARE_PEM_write(name, type) \
00322     DECLARE_PEM_write_bio(name, type) \
00323     DECLARE_PEM_write_fp(name, type) 
00324 
00325 #define DECLARE_PEM_write_cb(name, type) \
00326     DECLARE_PEM_write_cb_bio(name, type) \
00327     DECLARE_PEM_write_cb_fp(name, type) 
00328 
00329 #define DECLARE_PEM_read(name, type) \
00330     DECLARE_PEM_read_bio(name, type) \
00331     DECLARE_PEM_read_fp(name, type)
00332 
00333 #define DECLARE_PEM_rw(name, type) \
00334     DECLARE_PEM_read(name, type) \
00335     DECLARE_PEM_write(name, type)
00336 
00337 #define DECLARE_PEM_rw_cb(name, type) \
00338     DECLARE_PEM_read(name, type) \
00339     DECLARE_PEM_write_cb(name, type)

00343 #define PEM_write_SSL_SESSION(fp,x) \
00344         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_SSL_SESSION, \
00345             PEM_STRING_SSL_SESSION,fp, (char *)x, NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00346 #define PEM_write_X509(fp,x) \
00347         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_X509,PEM_STRING_X509,fp, \
00348             (char *)x, NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00349 #define PEM_write_X509_REQ(fp,x) PEM_ASN1_write( \
00350         (int (*)())i2d_X509_REQ,PEM_STRING_X509_REQ,fp,(char *)x, \
00351             NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00352 #define PEM_write_X509_CRL(fp,x) \
00353         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_X509_CRL,PEM_STRING_X509_CRL, \
00354             fp,(char *)x, NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00355 #define PEM_write_RSAPrivateKey(fp,x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u) \
00356         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_RSAPrivateKey,PEM_STRING_RSA,fp,\
00357             (char *)x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u)
00358 #define PEM_write_RSAPublicKey(fp,x) \
00359         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_RSAPublicKey,\
00360             PEM_STRING_RSA_PUBLIC,fp,(char *)x,NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00361 #define PEM_write_DSAPrivateKey(fp,x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u) \
00362         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_DSAPrivateKey,PEM_STRING_DSA,fp,\
00363             (char *)x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u)
00364 #define PEM_write_PrivateKey(bp,x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u) \
00365         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_PrivateKey,\
00366         (((x)->type == EVP_PKEY_DSA)?PEM_STRING_DSA:PEM_STRING_RSA),\
00367             bp,(char *)x,enc,kstr,klen,cb,u)
00368 #define PEM_write_PKCS7(fp,x) \
00369         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_PKCS7,PEM_STRING_PKCS7,fp, \
00370             (char *)x, NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00371 #define PEM_write_DHparams(fp,x) \
00372         PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_DHparams,PEM_STRING_DHPARAMS,fp,\
00373             (char *)x,NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00374 
00375 #define PEM_write_NETSCAPE_CERT_SEQUENCE(fp,x) \
00376                 PEM_ASN1_write((int (*)())i2d_NETSCAPE_CERT_SEQUENCE, \
00377             PEM_STRING_X509,fp, \
00378                         (char *)x, NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL)
00379

00381     (char *(*)())d2i_SSL_SESSION,PEM_STRING_SSL_SESSION,fp,(char **)x,cb,u)
00382 #define PEM_read_X509(fp,x,cb,u) (X509 *)PEM_ASN1_read( \
00383     (char *(*)())d2i_X509,PEM_STRING_X509,fp,(char **)x,cb,u)

00390 #define PEM_read_RSAPublicKey(fp,x,cb,u) (RSA *)PEM_ASN1_read( \

00392 #define PEM_read_DSAPrivateKey(fp,x,cb,u) (DSA *)PEM_ASN1_read( \
